Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoofusRickEnemy, EvilRickEnemy, GuardRickEnemy, PickelRickEnemy, ToxicRickEnemy

    public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that defines the base behaviors for all enemies in the game. Enemies have health, x and y coordinates, a boolean to determine if they are alive or not, and strings to keep track of the graphics needed.
    Author:
    David Gonzales, Mario Verdugo, Luke Cernetic, Chris Crabtree

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Enemy​()
      Default constructor for any enemy class

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage​(int damageAmount)
        Method to represent an enemy taking damage from a tower. The amount of health it will lose depends on the attack power of the given tower
        Parameters:
        damageAmount - - attack power from the attacking tower
